member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the Value that decides the position of the CircularPointer in the CircularScale.
member.remarks: Value property is one of the most important property. Based on the Value property pointer has been positioned on the CircularScale. Value should resides between the start and end value of the scale. If the value of this property is less than StartValue of the CircularScale, then the StartValue of the CircularScale is set to the Value of the pointer. Similarly EndValue of the CircularScale is set to the Value of the pointer when Value is greater that EndValue of the scale.
